verses.content: Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu a hung nâwk a, mi a in lai sukhar angin a mi hung sukhar tah a.
Ka kuoma chun, “Ieng am i hmu a?” a ta. Kei chun, “Rângkachak sa- thâu khâwnvar siena, a sîpa a thlêng le, chu chunga khâwnvar pasari um, khâwnvar tin chunga a dâwt pasari seng um ka hmuh,
a sîrah oliv thing pahni: thlêng changtieng panga chun pakhat, a vawitieng panga chun pakhat dang leh,” ka ta.
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu kân dawn a, “Pu, hieng hi ieng am an na?” tiin.
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chun ka kuomah, “Hieng hi ieng am an ni i hriet naw maw?” tiin a mi dawn a. Kei chun, “Aw pu, ka hriet nawh,” ka ta.
Ama chun ka kuomah, “Hi hi Zerubbabel kuoma LALPA thu, ‘Sipai- in ni loin, thilthawtheina khawma ni loin, amiruokchu, ka thlarauin,’ tiha sipaihai LALPAIN a hril chu a nih,” a ta.
Aw tlâng lien, tu am i na? Zerubbabel hmaa chun phaizâwl hung ni el i tih, chun, ama chun a chungah, “Zângaina, zângaina,” ti khêkrihai leh lung chunghnungtak chu hung la suok a tih.
Chu nawa khawm LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,
“Hi in lungphûm hi Zerubbabel kuthai chun a lo phûm tah a; a kuthai chun zo khawm zo ngei a tih; chun, nang chun sipaihai LALPA chun a mi hung tir a nih ti hre tâng i tih.

Thil chînhai ni chu tuin am a hmusit hlak hrim a? Hlim an ta, Zerubbabel kuta chun enremna, hieng pasarihai ngei, chuong LALPA mithai ngei chu an hmu ding a ni sih a; anni chu khawvêl po po kil tin kil tanga chun an tlân vêl tah a,” tiin.
Chun, keiin a kuomah, “Hieng oliv thing pahni sathâu khâwnvar siena sîr changtienga mi le vawi- tienga mi hi ieng am an nih a?” ka ta.
A vawi hninaa khawm kân dawn nâwk a, a kuomah, “Rângka- chak hriek hung suokna rângkachak dâwt pahni kâwla oliv kau pahni hi ieng am an nih a?” ka ta.
“Hieng hi ieng am an ni i hriet naw maw?” a ta, a mi dawn a. Kei chun, “Ka hriet nawh, ka lalpa” ka ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Hieng hi hrieknâl naupasal pahnihai chu an nih, leihnuoi po po LALPA sîra ngîr hlakhai chu an nih,” a ta.
